item.description:
This talk will look into in the Shin Buddhist perspective of self-acceptance. We tend to get stuck and suffer with our old habits, upbringing and a self-created personal narrative. How does the Shin path confronts us with our baggage and nurtures our capacity for mindfulness, love, acceptance and trust? Presented by Dojin.

See our CALENDAR @

www.bffct.net

p.s. REMINDER - Hosted by the Buddhist Faith Fellowship. Even though just one or two people from Meetup have RSVPed, you can expect 35 - 45 people in attendance.
item.how_to_find_us: Hosted by the Buddhist Faith Fellowship. Even though just one or two people from Meetup have RSVPed, you can expect 35 - 45 people in attendance.

group.name: Buddhist Faith Fellowship in Middletown, Ct

item.name: Teachings of the Buddha - Topic: Progress, Not Perfection
